RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 73. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to the Main Track, thi s race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ATTEST sharp to the front, dueled from far turn to stretch and went clear in the final furlong under good handling. BROWN LIQUOR MAN between horses into first turn, up to duel winner, no match. RAGING WHIRLWIND raced off rail throughout while coming on for show spot late. GOOD SOUL unhurried early from off rail early, no late kick in the stretch. HABITUS inside trip throughout while evenly with no response when needed. SMART DRESSER pressed winner to the half with a steady fade from there. MONEY POINT outside run into first turn with a minimal effort throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Habitus
ENTRY.OWNER: Richmond Lewis Guinn Victoria and Shifflett Cheryl
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip throughout while evenly with no response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Attest
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp to the front, dueled from far turn to stretch, went clear

ENTRY.NAME: Raging Whirlwind
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced off rail throughout while coming on for show spot late

ENTRY.NAME: Brown Liquor Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses into first turn, up to duel winner, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Good Soul
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early from off rail early, no late kick in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Smart Dresser
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC Hertrich III Frederick and Fielding John D
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed winner to the half with a steady fade from there

ENTRY.NAME: Money Point
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside run into first turn with a minimal effort throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 57. Allowance Purse 25600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 30 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YOU NAME IT just off leader to the half, kicked in stretch run along in time. PRICELESS PICTURE raced a wide trip throughout with a late rush at the wire for 2nd. TWENTY FOUR KARAT inside speed to the front,led to deep stretch swallowed up. STORM OF NINETEEN unseated rider post parade, pressed leader off rail to deep str. MISS ELIANA awkward from the gate with no response thereafter. PRONTO CHARLI went wrong early, pulled up in at half in distress vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Priceless Picture
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced a wide trip throughout with a late rush at the wire for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Twenty Four Karat
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front,led to deep stretch swallowed up

ENTRY.NAME: You Name It
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off leader to the half, kicked in stretch run along in time

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Eliana
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward from the gate with no response thereafter

ENTRY.NAME: Pronto Charli
ENTRY.COMMENT: went wrong early, pulled up in at half in distress vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Storm of Nineteen
ENTRY.COMMENT: unseated rider post parade, pressed leader off rail to deep str

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this ra ce will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRACE CANDY outside speed to the front well rated along, drove clear late. GOOD TURN tried to keep up with winner throughout, clearly best of rest. MUCHA no speed to the turn, ran on well in the stretch run for show. MYSTIFY no speed to the turn, ran on from quarter pole to improve late. QUEEN OF ATLANTIS raced along evenly between horses with no late response. SLY WINK outside trip to the turn with no late response in the stretch. PARTY NEVER ENDS good position throughout never far back to the stretch faltered. TRANQUIL TIMES tried to keep up to the turn, gave in readily in the stretch run. PINK SOLITAIRE never factored throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Mucha
ENTRY.OWNER: Claiborne Farm and Dilschneider, Adele B.
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the turn, ran on well in the stretch run for show

ENTRY.NAME: Tranquil Times
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up to the turn, gave in readily in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Queen of Atlantis
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly between horses with no late response

ENTRY.NAME: Pink Solitaire
ENTRY.COMMENT: never factored throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Good Turn
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up with winner throughout, clearly best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Party Never Ends
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position throughout never far back to the stretch faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Mystify
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the turn, ran on from quarter pole to improve late

ENTRY.NAME: Grace Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside speed to the front well rated along, drove clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Sly Wink
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside trip to the turn with no late response in the stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Special Weight Purse 23700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MR. REDLEGS rushed inside hounding leader into the stretch, kept on and prevailed to the wire. TOUGH CAT close up early, lost position into turn and stretch, rallied in earnest in the final sventy yards with a late rush to just miss. RED CHILI PEPPER sprinted clear to the turn but collared into the stretch and, stayed game to the wire for show spot. RUN RED RUN broke in a tangle, recovered to race evenly, throughout. RADIO SILENT raced along evenly with no response when needed. VERNON'S BEST close up early with a quick retreat from the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Run Red Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in a tangle, recovered to race evenly, throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Tough Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up early, lost position to turn stretch with a late rush

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Redlegs
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed inside hounding leader into the stretch, kept on prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Radio Silent
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Vernon's Best
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up early with a quick retreat from the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Red Chili Pepper
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear to turn, collared in the turn, stayed game to wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since May 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHIEF MYSTIQUE dueled off rail to the turn, roused into the stretch, gamely held to the wire. AGENT COOPER inside run to the turn behind leaders, darted to rail with a rush. DUDLEY broke sharp tried to keep up from off rail, kept on show gamely. BRONX speed between horses to duel, stayed game to stretch weakened. JUST CHITU inside position with speed to turn, gave in readily into stretch. BAKER'S MAN broke tardy from the gate while never a menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Baker's Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke tardy from the gate while never a menace

ENTRY.NAME: Agent Cooper
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Martin Perry
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to the turn behind leaders, darted to rail with a rush

ENTRY.NAME: Just Chitu
ENTRY.OWNER: Wilson Jr David and Wilson Jeffrey D
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside position with speed to turn, gave in readily into stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Bronx
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed between horses to duel, stayed game to stretch weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Dudley
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp tried to keep up from off rail, kept on show gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Chief Mystique
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled off rail to the turn, roused into the stretch, gamely held

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 73. Starter Allowance Purse 14400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since May 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (C laiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAJUN DELIGHT just off leader to the took over into the stretch, ridden out. WHISKEY SIS tracking to pair to the quarter pole, went after winner no match. TAMI ANN awkward start, far back to turn saving ground, good late run. ERV'S WENCH raced along evenly in a good effort throughout. FOOT RUB LOVE sped to the front under pressure to the half, gave in thru stretch. BOURBON SOCIAL had a bad start while held in the gate at the start and declared a non starter in the race with all monies refunded to the public . MELANCHOLY BLUES through early and dropped far back throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Tami Ann
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, far back to turn saving ground, good late run

ENTRY.NAME: Erv's Wench
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly in a good effort throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Sis
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracking to pair to the quarter pole, went after winner no match

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Delight
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off leader to the took over into the stretch, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Melancholy Blues
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early and dropped far back throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Foot Rub Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: sped to the front under pressure to the half, gave in thru stetch

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Social
ENTRY.COMMENT: had a bad start and declared a non starter in the race

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Cincinnatian S. BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 1 1/16M Turf CR: 69. Stakes Purse 75000. FOR FILLIES, THREE YEARS OLD, ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FACTISIMFLASHY dueled to the half well handled, took over far turn, clear, in the stretch with a game.effort to prevail. CANELA FINA trailed to far turn weaving thru traffic kept on with a game run. BETTER HALF secured good position with a bid in the stretch run but hung late. SECRETS UNTOLD raced back to the half, came widest into stretch while evenly late with no late kick. LEMON MOUSSE no speed early on with a middle move to far turn, came up empty. NEAR PERFECT good position to far turn with nothing left in the stretch run. KETTLE KISS raced back throughout with little improvement throughout. WILLIAMSBEACHBABE never a real factor. GO GIRL speed to the front dueled to the half, game far turn, faltered. DRIVEN FOR SUCCESS inside run to the half, checked at the half, gave way readily. EMERALD EYES good position to the half, shuffled back into far turn and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Secrets Untold
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back to the half, came widest into stretch, evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: Go Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front dueled to the half, game far turn, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Better Half
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Ella D Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: secured good position with a bid in the stretch run, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Lemon Mousse
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed early on with a middle move to far turn, came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Near Perfect
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to far turn with nothing left in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Williamsbeachbabe
ENTRY.COMMENT: never a real factor

ENTRY.NAME: Kettle Kiss
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back throughout with little improvement throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Driven for Success
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to the half, checked at the half, gave way readily

ENTRY.NAME: Factisimflashy
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled to the half well handled, took over far turn, clear, game

ENTRY.NAME: Canela Fina
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to far turn weaving thru traffic kept on with a game run

ENTRY.NAME: Emerald Eyes
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to the half, shuffled back into far turn and faded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 17800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 30 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRIPLE ELVIS tracking leaders to far turn, ranged up dueled, took over and cleared while ridden out. DEVILS RED good position to turn outside kept on outside for place spot. FAST FELIX no speed from gate, far back to stretch good late run for show. HASTY STRIKE troubled from the gate, far back to stretch, improved position. FAST FALL saved ground while well back to the turn with no late kick. A. P. AVATAR tried to keep up, pushed on hard into turn with no response. ALL ABOUT CROGE flashed speed to the half, gave way readily and backed up. FINGERS quick speed from inside to the quarter pole but retreated quickly from inside through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Fall
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva Silver Lining Racing LLC Tennant Angela Tennant Kurt and 4C Sons LL
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground while well back to the turn with no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Hasty Strike
ENTRY.COMMENT: troubled from the gate, far back to stretch, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: All About Croge
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva and Hooves and Saddles LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed speed to the half, gave way readily and backed up

ENTRY.NAME: A. P. Avatar
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up, pushed on hard into turn with no response

ENTRY.NAME: Fingers
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick speed from inside to the quarter pole, retreated quickly

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Felix
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed from gate, far back to stretch good late run for show

ENTRY.NAME: Triple Elvis
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracking leaders to far turn, ranged up dueled, took over cleared

ENTRY.NAME: Devils Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to turn outside kept on outside for place spot
